events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate with a detailed resume and cover letter.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on the candidate's experience and role preference as a software developer.
A recruiter specialising in engineering hires has been assigned to the candidate's file to proceed with the screening and interview scheduling process.
Completed the initial screening where the candidate demonstrated strong foundational knowledge and enthusiasm for software development projects.
The candidate responded promptly and positively, expressing eagerness to move forward to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 5th at 10:00 AM to assess their coding and problem-solving skills.
